enter_new_time_prompt: ⏰ Enter the new time for notifications (HH:MM):
unsubscribe_confirmation: ✅ You have successfully unsubscribed from weather notifications.
city_not_set_error: ❌ You have not specified a city. Subscribe or change the city.
weather_fetch_error: ❌ Failed to fetch weather data for the city
no_weather_data: 📊 Weather statistics are not available yet. Request current weather to start collecting data.
enter_time_prompt: ⏰ Enter the time for notifications in HH:MM format (e.g., 09:00):
timezone_notice: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: The bot operates in UTC+3 timezone.
invalid_time_format_error: ❌ Invalid time format. Enter the time in format
subscription_success: ✅ You have successfully subscribed to weather notifications for
subscription_error: ❌ An error occurred while saving your subscription. Please try again.
unsubscribe_success: ✅ You have successfully unsubscribed from weather updates.
resubscribe_success: ✅ You have successfully resumed your subscription.
invalid_feedback_error: ❌ Your feedback cannot be empty. Please try again.
admin_only_command: 🔒 This command is available only to the administrator.
new_users_last_week: 📈 New users in the last week
language_change_error_ru: ❌ An error occurred while changing the language.
language_change_error_en: ❌ An error occurred while changing the language.
weather_template:
☁️ **Weather in {city}:**
🌡️ Temperature: {temperature}°C (feels like {feels_like}°C)
💧 Humidity: {humidity}%
📊 Pressure: {pressure} hPa
💨 Wind: {wind_speed} m/s
☁️ Cloudiness: {cloudiness}%
👀 Visibility: {visibility} km
🌅 Sunrise: {sunrise}
🌇 Sunset: {sunset}
🌧️ Rain: {rain} mm
❄️ Snow: {snow} mm
🌤️ Description: {description}
